name: 10th international Conference Food Safety and Health
content: 10th international Conference Food Safety and Health is an award-winning international conference that encourages effective knowledge transfer and best practices exchange amongst over 250 Food Safety and health experts from 50 countries. Oral talks, poster presentation, video presentation, key note addresses will feature in the conference. It aims to strengthen the participantâ€™s action and impact on national, regional and international scales through a multidisciplinary program that features the latest successful interventions in cancer prevention, diagnosis, treatment and care.
